decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of the decision notice. Reason: To comply with the provisions of S.51 of the Planning & Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:Location PlanBlock Plan 2025/716/05002025/716/0101 2025/716/01022025/716/02012025/716/02022025/716/0203Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

All new external work shall be in materials to match the existing building or carried out in materials as specified in the approved application.Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area.

Prior to above ground works details of 1.8m privacy screen along both sides of the raised patio shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The privacy screening shall be installed in accordance with the details approved before the first use of the development and be maintained in perpetuity.Reason: To safeguard the privacy of the occupiers of the adjoining neighbour.
description: Single storey rear extension and raised patio to rear.
